body.p:
Fairview
Christian County
Kentucky
His Excellency
Beriah McGoffin
Frankfort
Ky.
Dear Sir.

We of Pembroke District. Christian County, are literally without a magistrate. but one in the district; and he living some in one corner of the district some 10 or 12 miles from us. Esq Moody died in August last since which time we have been destitute of the servises of the office Judge A D Rogers has informed us that he made the reccommendation of Henderson Wade to you in september last, that no commission has as yet been received. for Mr Wade to enter upon the discharge of official duties. We pray your honor to attend to our distress at your earliest convenience

With assurance of Our high esteem
We are
E. S. Stuart
John W Peters
G. W. Latham
Richard Vaughan
Alex Layne
